You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesC C] > &cedil

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&cedil;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00b8/index.htm U+000B8].
  * `&cedil` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00b8/index.htm U+000B8].
